        public java.lang.String getNextURL()

                                   java.lang.Exception
        recive next line from file as string
        Specified by:
        getNextURL in interface ReadInput
        Returns:
        Next line in text file of URLs
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - this exception happen when same parameters no correct,like file not exist
        java.io.IOException - this exception happen when same error ocured in reading file
        java.lang.Exception - when the file ends - it is usful exception for indication to main that the file is ended.
